title: How do busy CEOs stay updated on business performance? Explain pls? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mainly by exception reporting. There are key performance indices in the areas of output, quality, productivity, inventory, debtors and creditors, assets and liabilities, turnover, contribution, bank borrowings, cashfow etc which are reported to CEOs. Kaplan's Balanced Scorecard is an example of such reporting.
